---
title: "Example SQL Server Connection"
---

Now that the drivers and environment variables are in place, you can connect to SQL Server from Python using SQLAlchemy. 

To make the process smoother, all necessary files are already available in a GitHub repository. Follow the instructions to clone it and set up your environment:

[GitHub Repository: mssql-example](https://github.com/kirenz/mssql-example)

In the next section, you'll see a detailed description of the script `sql_example.py`.
